heading.heading: WRITE UI ONCE (JAVASCRIPT)
heading.description: on Web, Node (server side rendering), Native Mobile, Windows Universal, Mac, Linux..

columns.heading: Heading 1
columns.description: Accomplish in 10 lines what would otherwise take 1000, thanks to an integrated JavaScript stack that extends from the database to the end user's screen.
